name: Bold Blade
description: Bold Blade, the bitesize pixel art action RPG where your sword keeps getting bigger! Pursuing the legend of a sword powerful enough to fell mountains, you journey to a remote island populated by demons.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: Intel Core2 Quad CPU Q8200 Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 9500 GT Storage: 100 MB available space
